statement.tex: \text{Show that the four points A, B, C and D} \\ \text{whose position vectors are }\vector{4}{5}{1}, \vector{}{-}{-}, \\ \vector{3}{9}{4} \text{ and }4(\vector{-}{1}{1})\text{ respectively,} \\ \text{are coplanar.}

step.context: \text{Can the following be said about any} \\ \text{three non-colinear points?}
step.reason: \text{It takes three points to form a plane. Therefore} \\ \text{{\bf any} three non-colinear points are coplanar.}
